Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Hostilities continue to wind down throughout the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]] though tensions are still high, with systems along the borders seeing raids from the various [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSuccessorState],Successor States]].  It appears that the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGreatHouses],Great Houses]] are more concerned with fleeting gains over helping their citizenry from the horrors of the Third Succession War.



Labor disputes on the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],Free Worlds League]] system of [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Tiber(FWL)],Tiber]] have broken down, and workers are threatening to go on strike.  As one of the major production centers in the FWL, we can expect a stiff response.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
ComStar continues its mission to the Periphery States, building new [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHPG],HPG]] stations and recruiting new initiates to the Order from souls wishing to serve the vision of the Blessed Blake.



If you are interested in serving the Order, we welcome you to reach out to your local [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreComStarAdept],Adept]].





This has been the CNB January broadcast.
